titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Rules and Administration.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Rules. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Ford. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 4.

action.text: Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 1/28/1993--Introduced. Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Committee on Rules and Administration for the 103d Congress.
